projects.description: Displays a random quote with a random background color either each time the button is clicked, or every 10 seconds.
Created a page where it shows 12 employeess. You can click the page buttons on the bottom as well as search a specific employee.
An interactive form with validation informing user of incorrect data upon submitting. Conflicting options aside from user's choice will be deselected or hidden.

Objected Oriented Word game where user is given a phrase to guess. Takes both mouse and keyboard input, if user guesses incorrectly they lose  a heart, upon losing all hearts the game is over. If the user guesses the phrase they receive a winning page.

Utilizing RandomUser API, it fetches 12 random people. There is a search functionality to search upon the 12 users. Clicking on a person opens their modal with more detail, with back and next buttons to toggle through other users' modals.
